text: Azal Avia Cargo (Cargo Airline of the State Concern Azərbaycan Hava Yolları Azerbaijan Airlines) is a cargo airline based in Baku, Azerbaijan. It operates scheduled and charter cargo services within Azerbaijan and to other CIS countries. Its main base is Heydar Aliev International Airport, Baku.Flight International, Directory:World Airlines, p.83, 27 March 2007 == History == The airline was established in 1996 and is wholly owned by Azerbaijan Airlines. == Fleet == The Azal Avia Cargo fleet includes the following aircraft (at March 2007): *2 Antonov An-12 *1 Antonov An-26B *1 Ilyushin Il-76TD ===Previously operated=== *1 Antonov An-32 (at August 2006)Flight International, 3–9 October 2006 ==See also== *List of Azerbaijani companies *Baku Cargo Terminal == References == Category:Airlines of Azerbaijan Category:Airlines established in 1996
title: Azal Avia Cargo
